Docs.summary: The album title for the media.

remarks.para: The album title for the media.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a .

remarks.para: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a .
The artwork should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork should be used instead.

Docs.summary: The artist for the album of the media's original source.

remarks.para: The artist for the album of the media's original source.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Uri formatted String.

remarks.para: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Uri formatted String. The artwork can be loaded using a combination of and .
For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support for retrieving scaled artwork through .

Docs.summary: The artwork for the media as a .

remarks.para: The artwork for the media as a .
The artwork should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork should be used instead.

Docs.summary: The artist of the media.

remarks.para: The artist of the media.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the media as a Uri formatted String.

remarks.para: The artwork for the media as a Uri formatted String. The artwork can be loaded using a combination of and .
For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support for retrieving scaled artwork through .

Docs.summary: The author of the media.

remarks.para: The author of the media.

Docs.summary: The compilation status of the media.

remarks.para: The compilation status of the media.

Docs.summary: The composer of the media.

remarks.para: The composer of the media.

Docs.summary: The date the media was created or published.

remarks.para: The date the media was created or published. The format is unspecified but RFC 3339 is recommended.

Docs.summary: The disc number for the media's original source.

remarks.para: The disc number for the media's original source.

Docs.summary: A description that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A description that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying more information for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present.

Docs.summary: An icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: An icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying an icon for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present. This must be a .
The icon should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork should be used instead.

Docs.summary: A Uri formatted String for an icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A Uri formatted String for an icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying more information for media described by this metadata the display description should be preferred to other fields when present. The icon can be loaded using a combination of and .
For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support for retrieving scaled artwork through .

Docs.summary: A subtitle that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A subtitle that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying a second line for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present.

Docs.summary: A title that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A title that is suitable for display to the user. This will generally be the same as but may differ for some formats. When displaying media described by this metadata this should be preferred if present.

Docs.summary: The duration of the media in ms.

remarks.para: The duration of the media in ms. A negative duration indicates that the duration is unknown (or infinite).

Docs.summary: The genre of the media.

remarks.para: The genre of the media.

Docs.summary: A String key for identifying the content.

remarks.para:
A String key for identifying the content. This value is specific to the service providing the content. If used, this should be a persistent unique key for the underlying content. It may be used with
to initiate playback when provided by a connected to the same app.

Docs.summary: The number of tracks in the media's original source.

remarks.para: The number of tracks in the media's original source.

Docs.summary: The overall rating for the media.

remarks.para: The overall rating for the media.

Docs.summary: The title of the media.

remarks.para: The title of the media.

Docs.summary: The track number for the media.

remarks.para: The track number for the media.

Docs.summary: The user's rating for the media.

remarks.para: The user's rating for the media.

Docs.summary: The writer of the media.

remarks.para: The writer of the media.

Docs.summary: The year the media was created or published as a long.

remarks.para: The year the media was created or published as a long.

Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
